step1.title: Almost there
step1.p1: Welcome to Brikool platform! You have chosen to be our associate freelancer. We are thrilled to have you on board. As a freelancer, you will have access to a wide range of opportunities and resources tailored to your skills and interests. Please finish your account setup to get started on your journey with us.
step1.p2: Click on next to proceed and complete your account setup. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team. We are here to help you every step of the way.

step2.title: Brand
step2.description: Please set up your public brand profile. This will be visible to other users on the platform.

step3.title: Categories
step3.description: Please select the categories that best describe your skills and interests. This will help us match you with the right opportunities. You can select up to 3 categories.

error.invalid: Please select at least one category
error.invalid_max: You can select up to 3 categories

step4.title: Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
step4.p1: Congratulations! Your account has been set up, and youâ€™re ready to begin your freelance journey with Brikool. Click "I agree" to proceed and explore new opportunities.
step4.p2: By clicking "I agree", you confirm that you have read and accepted our

success.title: Congratulations
success.message: Your account has been successfully set up

error.title: Error
error.message: An error occurred. Please try again
